reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater stylish and comfortable, with a ribbed design that's not too tight. They appreciate its soft material and nice color, with one customer noting it dresses up jeans or black pants well. Customers describe it as high-quality and flattering, with one mentioning it hugs in all the right places.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Top
items.body: Nice Top, soft and sexy Read more
items.author: Joyce Staszewski

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning and Comfortable!
items.body: I absolutely love this sweater with the criss-cross front! It’s not only stylish but also so flattering. The design adds a trendy twist to a classic sweater, and the fit is perfect — not too tight, just the right amount of room. It looks great dressed up or down, whether paired with jeans or a skirt. The fabric is soft and comfortable, and it feels cozy without being bulky. I’ve gotten so many compliments whenever I wear it. Definitely a new favorite in my wardrobe! Highly recommend if you want something that’s both fashionable and comfortable! Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful shirt!
items.body: This product is made fairly well with decent fabric. It wasn’t too thin or too thick! The color is beautiful! It was also not too tight which was a concern! Has great stretch in the fit! Read more
items.author: Katie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy not Sleezy
items.body: Very nice top. Fabric good, not thin. Color true to picture, a rich dark green. I am about 36-30-40 Ht 5'3". The sweater fits my figure comfortably with a waist and doesn't make me look thick in the middle and it's not snug. The length rides on my hips but not over my butt. I have full bust and am covered yet has the sexy peek-a-boo cutout. I would order more if this style but it's such a striking top it gets attention. Sexy but not skeezy. Is as pictured. Read more
items.author: Carol Cunningham

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy
items.body: Excellent design ! Flattering… material and stretch design. However, I ordered a size up because I did not want the form fit in the stomach area so it was OK for my stomach area but even with DD implants, The Kris Kross and top across the breast part was too loose. You cannot bend over in this shirt unless — OK you are thin in the stomach and buy the correct size ! In other words, if you are a heavier woman & want something sexy without exposing mom belly it will do. On the other hand, this shirt would be perfect if there was less material across the boobs only. ! For reference ; I’m 5’8 & 212 Lbs 38DD XXL in Red wine color. Read more
items.author: INFINITY93

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poorly made!
items.body: Poorly made poorly made! The twist is completely off. Fabric isn’t cut properly so it ends up choking you no matter what size you choose Read more
items.author: BeBe

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item fits good
items.author: Sharon

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So so soft
items.body: Very cute! Soo soft. Better than I expected! Wore for our Christmas pictures. It did have almost a pink hue to it more than a cream color Read more
items.author: Bex

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Red Black Stripe, Blue Black Stripe, Black Apricot Brown Stripe, Black, Camel, Coffee, White Black Stripe, Apricot Black Stripe, Dark Red, Dark Green, Red, Rose Red, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
